name: PAWNG (Skeeve, rsvp asap)
description:
Face-off in PAWNG: the multiplayer brick  breaking experience ! 

Choose either the cat or dog and battle it out to break the target! First one to 3 wins! This 2 player game features 5 unique levels and 4 different block types.

Controls: 

P1:

Up: W

Down: S

Launch Ball: D

P2: 

Up: Up Key

Down: Down Key

Launch  Ball: Left Key

PAWNG was created in 2 days for #GGJ2022 by Skeeve_NL & rsvp asap

Music:  TinyWorlds & Chasersgaming
